home.title: Weather Machine Solo Helper
home.play1: Play against Agent White and Agent Pink, the Solo Mode opponents of Weather Machine.
home.play2: This helper application replaces the solo cards and hideout board.

setupDifficultyLevel.title: Setup Difficulty Level
setupDifficultyLevel.firstTime: If you play the first time, go ahead to setup the game.
setupDifficultyLevel.greaterChallenge: For a greater challenge, you can use 1 or more additional challenges:

setupGame.title: Setup Game
setupGame.lativBots: Place one of Lativ’s Bots in each branch of the Weather Machine in the Lab.
setupGame.researchTokens: Use only 2 Research tokens of each type in each Main Location.
setupGame.goalTilesStep1: Remove all Goal tiles that show a majority icon in the top right. Also remove the tile that requires you to have 3 Award tokens.
setupGame.goalTilesStep2: From the remaining Goal tiles choose 2 of each color at random. If you draw any 2 with the same icon in the middle of the tile, discard the second, and keep drawing until you get all different ones.
setupGame.goalTilesStep3: Remove all remaining Goal tiles from the game. The Saboteurs do not use Goal tiles.
setupGame.anotherPlayerColor: Select another player color for the Saboteurs. The Saboteurs do not use a Laboratory or Voucher markers.
setupGame.scoringMarker: Place the Saboteurs’ Scoring marker on {startingTargetValue} CP. This is the initial Target Value.
setupGame.turnOrder: Place the Turn Order and Initiative markers (both yours and the Saboteurs’) with yourself being first in turn order on both.
setupGame.hideout: Designate an area near the Main board as the Saboteurs’ Hideout.
setupGame.hideoutBots: Place the Saboteur’s Bots in the Hideout.
setupGame.hideoutChemicals: Select the following Chemicals, take them from the leftmost spaces in the Supply, and place them in the Hideout:
setupGame.hideoutAward: The Saboteurs start the game with an Award token:

fully-stocked-opponents.title: Fully Stocked Opponents
fully-stocked-opponents.description: The Saboteurs start the game with 1 of each Chemical instead of 2 Chemicals.

jamming-device.title: Jamming Devices
jamming-device.description: During each income, increase the Target Value by 1 for each Saboteur Bot on the board.

creative-accounting.title: Creative Accounting
creative-accounting.description: The Saboteurs start the game with an Award token. During each income, move one of your Funding markers back one space on one of the tracks. You must choose a track where you are able to do this, if possible.

nobel-laureate.title: Nobel Laureate
nobel-laureate.description: The Saboteurs start the game with an additional Chemical chosen at random (it may be the same as one they already have). You cannot win the game unless you have the Nobel Prize.

only-overachievers-apply.title: Only Overachievers Apply
only-overachievers-apply.description: You cannot win the game unless you meet the conditions of at least 5 of your Goal tiles on the Goal spaces of your Laboratory.

the-clock-is-ticking.title: The Clock is Ticking
the-clock-is-ticking.description: 2 cards of the Security Report deck are removed from play.

one-step-ahead.title: One Step Ahead
one-step-ahead.description: If, at the end of your turn, the Saboteurs’ Initiative marker is in the leftmost position, raise the Target Value by 3.

moral-high-ground.title: Moral High Ground
moral-high-ground.description: When placing your Scientist in a Location, you do not gain additional Vouchers for Saboteurs to your left.

peer-review.title: Peer Review
peer-review.description: You cannot use Citation tokens when publishing a paper. When you unlock a Citation space, you cannot pay a Science Voucher to gain 3 CP.

independent-prototypes.title: Independent Prototypes
independent-prototypes.description: The Saboteurs start the game with an Award. You cannot use the Saboteurs’ Bots when building a prototype as part of a Breakthrough action.

budget-cuts.title: Budget Cuts
budget-cuts.description: The Saboteurs start the game with an additional Chemical chosen at random (it may be the same as one they already have). Whenever you receive funding from the Lab Funding track, treat the modifier below your marker as +0 (you still gain the benefits of the Government or R&D track).

publish-or-perish.title: Publish or Perish
publish-or-perish.description: Lower the starting Target Value by 5. Whenever the Saboteurs cause a Lock token to be removed from a Citation space, raise the Target Value by 5. You must win by immediate victory (restoring the good name of Lightning Technologies).

action.abortGameConfirm: Aborting the running game - are you sure?
action.endGameConfirm: End this game and return to home screen - are you sure?
